ingredients: 1/2 cup dried red beans, such as kidney
1/2 cup dried cannellini or Great Northern beans
1 cup corn kernels (cut from about 2 ears)
1 whole red bell pepper, or 1/2 each red bell &nbsp pepper and green bell pepper, seeded and &nbsp chopped
1 whole red bell pepper, or 1/2 each red bell &nbsp pepper and green bell pepper, seeded and &nbsp chopped
1 whole red bell pepper, or 1/2 each red bell &nbsp pepper and green bell pepper, seeded and &nbsp chopped
Salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
